title: Planar region with log function part - b

content.description: In the figure above, R is the shaded region in the first quadrant bounded by the graph of y=4ln(3-x), the horizontal line y=6, and the vertical line x=2.
content.question: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the horizontal line y=8.

frqParts.text: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the horizontal line y=8.

topic.text: 8.12: Volume with Washer Method - Revolving Around Other Axes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
